They care a lot about the cliens.
If you are tired of thai kitchen and you want just a burger this is the right place to go.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Grill Bill
Review: We had a very tasteless double cheese burger and a dry, thai-oil covered barbecue chicken. Portions were big for sure but quality was only average.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Grill Bill
Review: Even thought this restaurant is marketing homemade burgers and pizzas (which are ok), I think they have better Thaifood than in many places. So, worth to try also local dishes.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Grill Bill
Review:
Tasty food, very good service.
Recommend ribs, steak and burgers. Garlic bread is fantastic.
Small restaurant with nice environment and fresh barbeque during eating.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Grill Bill

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Grill Bill

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Grill Bill

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Grill Bill
Review:
We had dinner here and the burger just stood out and that's when everything was already well executed. We had a large size and it came with 2 patties. The only thing missing is the pickle.
The mixed grill plate with the ribs was juicy...More

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: It's a small place. The staff is very friendly. The burgers (specially the Vega one) is absolutely amazing and from time to time a tasty variety to the local thai food. It's a little pricey but definitely worth.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review:
Be ready to pay double for a full combo ( burger + fries + drink )
But also be ready for good service and good food !!
The home made sauce is a must and the food was served FRESH and VERYYYY TASTY !!

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: Best Burgers by far! Patty was handmade and portion were big! Do not that they sell beers/alcohol but it is kept in a separated refrigerator and it is a little bit pricey.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: Tried their burgers two times for lunch during our holiday, they are very good. The there of us all had beef burgers, they have different kinds, all the ones we tried were good. Small place, with good service, so we can recommend.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: It's alright and tastes like home. There are also super interesting and cheaper burgers done by locals in old phuket townMore

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: Great food and fair prices. Big portions and very friendly owners. I ve been here a few times and have always had a great meal. Can’t recommend this place enough. If you love burgers then this is the place for you.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: Indeed the best burgers in town. A must try is the sweet burger and fries. also try the jambalaya souce. Thanks Boris for always serving so good burgers and for always keeping your smile, to all your staff.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: We had chicken cheese burger for dinner - meat and veges were fresh and full-filling! We love the sauces offered (they are free) - we tried their homemade sauce samurai something which was not bad at all :). Staff very friendly

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: there are lots of restuarants that serve burgers in Phuket but this is the only specialist burger house i found. The owner Boris also took time to talk to me,which gave it a personal touch. every other restuarant i went to was me paying money...More

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review:
The burgers were really good and tasty (maybe a little bit small if you're really hungry). The owner and the waitress were REALLY nice, polite and funny.
Really recommended!!!

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: Lovely staff . Great food. Fresh Fish burger better than others I have tried. My wife had chicken wrap also extremely good. Great value for this part of town.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: Stopped by for lunch, really good meaty burger and homemade dressing, loved the big fremhever fries as well. Really good service

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: The burgers here are really tasty, one of the best of Thailand! Owner and his wife are so kind. Definitely visit!

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review:
The staff is Very kind!!!
Boris speaks French, English very well!
The bread is fresh and the meat very well baked.
I recommend this restaurant to anyone who want to eat in a clean place!
The vibe is so good In burger house, I like...More

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: Amazing Burgers! Boris runs a very cozy joint. Had the double, mushroom and fish burgers all where fantastic. Each with its own unique dressing. Really great for lunch after a long day at the beach.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review:
I had my second burger in two days.
Homemade buns and burger fried onion
Fresh sallad and yummie garlic dressing
And cheddar cheese ,i say no Moore
Oh My budda this was heaven for My stomach
And made My day twice <f0><U+009F><U+0098><U+0080>

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: Good fries, but the burger had totally no taste. It could be good but without barbeque spice it can never be a burger (no matter what).

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: I ordered the cheese burger in combo with the beer and the chips, taste was absolutely delicious, chips were big enough. Beer was good but need to be a little bit more colder.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review:
Stumble across this place on our evening walk
I order the cheese burger which l realty enjoyed. My husband had the chicken burger. We also ordered fries
Food was good, staff attentive
Would recommend

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: Had tasty basic burger here on a hot day -Really good service the food is great and the music is great-Nice people.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: Had a cheeseburger meal and a chicken wrap. Nothing special about these. Tasted like every other grill.More

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: We were a bit tired of local food and craving a burger. Called them about 20 min before closing time and they waited for us; the cheese burger and the mushrooms one are very good choices. They sell beer. Recommended!!

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review:
Tried take out burgers from this Burger restaurant.
Was pleasantly surprised at the quality and taste. Probably one of the best burgers I have eaten in Thailand.
Great when you have a craving for a good old fashioned Burger
Great fries and onion rings

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: The best burger you can get in Phuket, the shop is small but the meals are so delicious. Definitely will visit again.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: My husband and I visited once we landed in Phuket as this was right outside of our hotel. The food was fresh and so tasty! A proper burger, fast food but so fresh!

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: Popped for a late snack and this hit the spot. Good tasty burgers, and great fries all cooked fresh . Service is quick and friendly and beers are cold. Lots of choices, we will be back.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: Exellent burgers! Nice affordable place, with a great vibe. Cannot wait to have a bite here again next week

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review:
Fast Food Garbage from this place makes up 50% of Street litter. We find every morning a lot of street littering, as wrappers and cups from Burger house around Kata-Plaza.
Why this place serve not normal glass and plates ? WHAT IS THE PROBLEM ?More

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: When you're tired of the thaifood this is an excellent choice. Very good and tasty mushroom hamburger.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: We were here 2 times. The food was very good every time. I had chesseburgers. The burgers were fresh cooked and very delicious. If you are looking for good burgers, than this is the place to be!

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: Good burger and fries, coffee house across the road, located hidden away on a busy corner next to good restuarants

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: Had our first dinner in phuket from Burger House. We ordered take away to eat back at our hotel. Walk all the way back with a nice smell accompanying us. The patty and the bun was awesome. The wedges was just amazing. Highly recommanded.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: An excellent burger cooked to perfection and delivered with a huge smile. Thank you burger house kata

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review:

Firstly may I say that the staff are very friendly.
Always a little worrying when a restaurant is quiet, but rest assured the burgers are amazing, very tasty and served the way...More

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review:

Anyway this place was ok. Seemingly frozen fish burger and a small and...More

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review:
Friendly service from the girl that took our order but if this place wants to be a burger house they should do burgers from scratch. Meat tasted like a frozen paddy. McDonalds is even better.
The other girl charged us the wrong price... when we...More

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: I dont know what was in the burger but it sure didnt taste like beef. The fries were fabulous hot and tasty! The burger bun was sesame seed and seemed home-made.More

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review:
the BBQ & Mushroom Cheese burger was really delicious, the bun was soft and buttery as if it was home made (maybe it was?!) and so was the texas fries basket.
we really enjoyed the meal and and the staff and owner were friendly and...More

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: Try the chicken burger here (like a KFC Zinger burger) - very nice. French fries are the best in Kata. Great for a change from Thai.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: Tasty, clean, fresh and halal burger ... Good service, friendly staff ... Try the classic burger and onion rings it is nice and light ...

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: Very fast and delicious burgers. Godd variety of choice. Fast service and good working hours. Worth to visit.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: Husband and I visited burger house during our kata beach stay, burger was simple but nice, fresh and not oily, had the texas fries, really enjoyed them, not oily like some other loaded fries, good little place for a quick lunch.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review:
We headed down to Kata beach but before doing so felt like a quick lunch and decided on traditional burger and not Thai food.
Not a big place as its more a take out but they have 3 or 4 tables. Was empty so we...More

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: Tasty burgers reasonable prices all delivered relatively quickly. Dining out on a budget all covered, free wifi if you don't want to talk to anyone.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: Kids really enjoyed the burgers, great fries, and nice burger, made a change from thai food. Quick service, just off the main road . worth a visit

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: Good food at reasonable prices. Also our nine years old kids really liked the burgers. Definitely will come here again <f0><U+009F><U+0098><U+008B>More

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review:
Great pit stop place.
Just in pavement at junction.
Great change from the usual street
Had a cheese burger
Our Son is a burger fan and rated it 5*
He's 25 by the way!More

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review:

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review:
For a burger in Thailand I guess it's ok,
I think for a joint that's only doing burgers I'd expect a better patty.
Maybe give it a miss.More

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review:
Had a dbl cheese burger.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review:
This was a fun little place to grab a quick burger, though I was expecting more from the burger itself, given that the name and reputation of the place is focused on burgers. It was of average quality and taste, but seemed fresh.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: Great burgers, great location and good price. Got them a few times as they were right near our hotel. Definitely recommend their hot chips!! So good! Owner was lovely- sat and chatted with us one day. Highly recommend if you're craving a good burger.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: We were sick of eating out so got takeaway burgers. They were really good with everything fresh and very big.More

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: The burgers are not aussie grade burgers but they hit the spot for western food in asia, you shouldn't have western expectations in the first place. Their sides are as good as any western cafe.More

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review: Went here nearly every day while in kata for lunch! Cheap prices and awesome food! Chicken burger and cheese burger are delish! Best ones I had while in kata!More

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review:

I was...More

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach
Review:
Looking for a restaurant in our last night of Phuket, found heaps of restaurants that were harassing us for our business- was pretty annoyed actually but that is the Phuket way- then we saw a little sign for the best burgers.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Burger House Kata Beach

Hotel.Restaurant.name: New York Burger Co.
Review: Ordered a cheese burger they come with two beef patties which was great and tasted good, also order a standard burger for my 6year with only one beef patty that was discounted which was nice of them, thanks

Hotel.Restaurant.name: New York Burger Co.
Review: The burger patty tasted like liver and were overcooked. The rest og the food was okay. I cant understand how this place is rated so good with the food we got.. Thought i would be a lot better and was very disapointed..

Hotel.Restaurant.name: New York Burger Co.
Review:
The New York Burger restaurant is consistent in delivering a good quality burger.
Having eaten there several times now, I've yet to be disappointed by the food, or the service.
The owner is quite charming and with his staff, works hard to provide good food...More

Hotel.Restaurant.name: New York Burger Co.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: New York Burger Co.
Review: If your after a tasty burger definitely come here. Jalapeno mac and cheese balls are delicious too. Not too badly priced

Hotel.Restaurant.name: New York Burger Co.
Review: Visited this amazing place for a quick bite, burger & fries was delicious. Read the reviews on Trip advisor & it certainly lived up to it. Such a change from the Thai cuisine. Will visit before I leave on Sunday. Great choice!!!

Hotel.Restaurant.name: New York Burger Co.
Review:
Went there twice!!! After eating all of the local fare was really happy to come across this place. Not fancy, just AWESOME BURGERS!

Hotel.Restaurant.name: New York Burger Co.
Review: We enjoyed eating here! Good meat, well done burgers. Simplicity and quality. Thank you. <f0><U+009F><U+008D><U+0094><f0><U+009F><U+008D><U+00BA> my child was delighted as he is tired a bit of the Thai food.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: New York Burger Co.
Review:
Only a little place but the food!
after weeks of Thai food it was great to find this.
Burgers are homemade and everything came out hot!
Staff were smiling the whole time i was there.
Honestly! If your after a burger here is the place.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: New York Burger Co.
Review:

Hotel.Restaurant.name: New York Burger Co.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: New York Burger Co.
Review:
After many days of Thai food it had to be western food again. I was craving for juicy burgers with fries and was really glad to find New York Burger on trip advisor.
Fresh buns from a bakery and juicy fresh meat. I loved the...More

Hotel.Restaurant.name: New York Burger Co.
Review:
This is the best burger I've had in phuket. The meat is fresh and beefs are handmade. The buns are made by a local Danish bakery, and tastes really good.
The menu is simple and fries the slim type - and there are plenty of...More

Hotel.Restaurant.name: New York Burger Co.
Review: My wife and I visited New York Burger after walking around Phuket. The meal was good. I had the Mac and Cheese Burger, Mac and Cheese Bites, and my wife had the regular burger. Good western burger in Phuket.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: New York Burger Co.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: New York Burger Co.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: New York Burger Co.
Review:
Lovely burgers, for a nice break from thai food or if you've got the red meat cravings!
Good chips too and friendly staff.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: New York Burger Co.
Review:

Hotel.Restaurant.name: New York Burger Co.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: New York Burger Co.
Review: Today we found this wonderful burger house while we are wondering around. Good burger :) try mac and cheese and chat with owner!

Hotel.Restaurant.name: New York Burger Co.
Review:
we love hamburger meat; mac & cheese; both of them very tasty and at a normal price.
You must chat with the owner :)

Hotel.Restaurant.name: New York Burger Co.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: New York Burger Co.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: New York Burger Co.

Review: Great burger and fries with icy cold beer,good service,wifi,good tunes,best US License Plates collection in Thailand...what's not to like at Riders

Review:
Great food lovely Aussie owner definetly recccommend to anyone looking for a great burger
Cool decor very very relaxing

Review:
The atmosphere is very chilled and relaxed, the deco, the interior, i had a bacon burger which was awesome!!
They play good music!
The waiter was very friendly, they have free wifi, and you can not only eat burgers, but also thai food.
The only...More

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Rider Cafe
Review:
I am not a connoisseur of burgers but I can bet that this is one of the best!
There is a larger menu but I go here just for the burger.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Rider Cafe
Review:
Stumbled across this place as I was working down the road.after reading top reviews on TA decided to give it a go.And I was not dissapoibted.Ended up eating there at lease twice a week for the duration of my work contract.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Rider Cafe
Review: This place becomes alive during the Phuke Bike week with a bunch of ZZ TOP lookalikes. Cheers, your burgers are great guys !!!

Review: Burger, sandwiches, cakes, Thai dishes, coffee, we tried them all during our short stay in Old Phuket Town. Was not disappointed, everything tasted great and fresh, received good, friendly service. Good value for money. Would go back, if in town again. Thanks guys :)

Review:

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Rider Cafe
Review:

That's what you come here for.
Friendly place and very convenient if you are in Phuket Town.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Legends Sports Bar & Grill

Review: Ate here three times during our recent trip. The kids loved the burgers and prices were reasonable compared to other places. Atmosphere was OK, very Australian. Around the corner from the Graceland.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Legends Sports Bar & Grill
Review:
Burgers 9/10
Speed 9/10
Atmosphere 5/10
Smiles/ service 5/10
Prices, fair
Unlucky to visit on the holy day and watch the game of the afl without a beer in hand. Very unlucky.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Legends Sports Bar & Grill

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Legends Sports Bar & Grill

Legendary pork burger with great service and entertainment. Constant pool games with sports on the TV.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Legends Sports Bar & Grill

The hamburger is very good~
And location also! Is front of IBIS!
I love that ~

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Legends Sports Bar & Grill

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Legends Sports Bar & Grill

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Legends Sports Bar & Grill
Review: Owner and staff were excellent, best burgers in town, my son and I played pool every afternoon, and got great service.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Legends Sports Bar & Grill
Review:
We visited this bar on a couple of occasions during our stay in Patong. The owners wife was lovely, had great burgers 'Queenslander' and 'Aussie' - just like we'd get at home.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Legends Sports Bar & Grill
Review: this place has a great atmosphere, very friendly staff, burgers are the best, great meet up place on way back to resort, see you all next year

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Legends Sports Bar & Grill

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Legends Sports Bar & Grill
Review: Awesome little bar! Great burgers, friendly service and all round inviting atmosphere :) and free pool table, I highly Recommend the legends burger.

Review: Only tried the burgers but they we're really blend and boring. Didn't really like the combination ketchup, sweet mustard, beetroots and mayo...

Review:
Lived and worked in Phuket for many years and have not found a better place to rest and relax after a day diving or training. Coldest beers in Phuket, ice cold everytime!

Food was good-
Masman curry and noodles burger

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Full Moon Brewworks - Microbrewery & Lobs n' Roll

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Full Moon Brewworks - Microbrewery & Lobs n' Roll
Review:
Full moon brew works was great! My partner and I visited here twice, sampling the locally brewed beers (which were fantastic), burgers and wings!
Service was good, food and drinks were fantastic!

Review:

Review:
Very nice place.
Dish are good served and also the medium taste of all plates is good, around 7/10 points.
We tried the steak, the Joe's famous burger and the lobster (so theorically the best plates here).

Hotel.Restaurant.name: The Frying Kiwi Eatery
Review: My son was craving a burger and we found the Frying Kiwi. Wow he was impressed, best meal he had in Thailand he said. 2 burgers down and he was very happy!

Hotel.Restaurant.name: The Frying Kiwi Eatery
Review: Burgers and service were on par - brilliant to say the least- couldn’t finish! Would definatly go back!

Hotel.Restaurant.name: The Frying Kiwi Eatery
Review: Nice burger served, I think boss is not local. Experience authentic western food here ;) Beef burger is a must!

Review: You have a wide range of choices and none of them are bad, the fish is lightly battered and beautifully cooked, the burgers, well there are any number of choices. Personally prefer the fish and chips but cant go wrong on whatever choice you make

Hotel.Restaurant.name: The Frying Kiwi Eatery
Review:
Great fried fish, of several types. Chips are decent. Nice burgers (award winning).
I love it that they've added an air conditioned area, as it is very hot to sit and wait.
Friendly staff.
4 types of fish. Again, best fried fish in the area.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: The Frying Kiwi Eatery

Hotel.Restaurant.name: The Frying Kiwi Eatery
Review: Such a nice place. The service is perfect and the the only do burger of New Zealand beef - the meet is very tender. I really do recumbent this place.

Only reason I didn't give it an Excellent is because they only offer outdoor seating and it can get quite hot.

Never again.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: The Frying Kiwi Eatery
Review:
- good menu for fish and chip
- owner really friendly
- this is second award for burger fes in phuket 2016!!!!

Review: If you want a break from thai food then head to the Lucky 13 sandwich bar. Food & service excellent with prices to match . Had hamburgers & sandwiches on different occasions with food very good.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Lucky 13 Sandwich Patong
Review: I really love this place and enjoy the food especially burgers...awesome :) The staffs was so kind and helpful .I will be there next time for breakfast.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Bondi Aussie Bar & Grill Phuket
Review:

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Bondi Aussie Bar & Grill Phuket

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Bondi Aussie Bar & Grill Phuket

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Bondi Aussie Bar & Grill Phuket
Review:
Nice central restaurant on top of the jungceylon entrance. Great view to the mainstreet.
First time we had a burger, great burger and a super fantastic milk shake, but leave the bacon, its really terrible.
Second time we had the ribs full pack, awsome, tender...More

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Bondi Aussie Bar & Grill Phuket
Review:
I orderd a Bondi Burger and a Bondi Ice Tea, and i would do it again. The food is good.
The only drawback is that they dont have a toilet, just a bucket for guys to pee in...

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Bondi Aussie Bar & Grill Phuket

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Bondi Aussie Bar & Grill Phuket
Review: Probably the best garlic bread I've had in my life!!! 100% recommend if you feel like an Aussie meal (the Parma burgers are off the chain). Really inviting staff.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Bondi Aussie Bar & Grill Phuket

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Bondi Aussie Bar & Grill Phuket

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Bondi Aussie Bar & Grill Phuket
Review: They have a good service, its on the second floor of juncelyon mall, recommend to order a bacon cheese burger!!

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Bondi Aussie Bar & Grill Phuket

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Bondi Aussie Bar & Grill Phuket
Review:
Try the "Bondi Burger". But keep in mind you may not be able to fit out mouth around it! It's huge.
But worth it.
Aussie feel and music. Very nice.

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Bondi Aussie Bar & Grill Phuket
Review: They have nice burgers, i got the Peri Peri chicken burger & i wasn't disappointed! Their meals are simple and filling!

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Bondi Aussie Bar & Grill Phuket

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Bondi Aussie Bar & Grill Phuket
Review: Excellent if you want to dine out as an alternative to the abundance of Thai Food in Phuket. The Burgers are awesome and affordable

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Bondi Aussie Bar & Grill Phuket
Review:

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Bondi Aussie Bar & Grill Phuket

Review:
Super tough are the rumps, worst steak ever! The bacon burger was bland <f0><U+009F><U+0098><U+00A9>
The house brew Cha La Wan ale is decent.
Summing up - Looks good from near, far from good!!!

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Bondi Aussie Bar & Grill Phuket
Review: Ate here a few times recommend steaks and rack of ribs burgers were also good service was very good also

Hotel.Restaurant.name: Bondi Aussie Bar & Grill Phuket
